p: The antioxidant potential of LP EO was generally high with RP 50 and IC 50 of 0.16 and 0.18 μL/mL using RP and ABTS assays, respectively. Interestingly, carvacrol has shown comparable antioxidant activity (IC 50 = 0.03 μL/mL) relative to the potent antioxidant agent BHT using the ABTS assay and high antioxidant capacity (RP 50 = 0.07 μL/mL) comparable to the tested potent antioxidant agents (Trolox and BHT) ( Table 3).
